name: 10 Inch Car Battery Hold Down Bolt Kit Stainless Steels,J Bolts Battery Hold Down Kit Includes Hooks,Nuts,Washers,Covers,Universal Cars Batteries Holder Car Accessories
short_description: Firmly Support: Battery hold down kit is mainly used for car battery fixing, J hook design, the fixing effect is better than ordinary L hook, can firmly fix and support your car battery tray, even in the bumpy driving will not be loose and fall off, to keep the driving safety

Sturdy Construction: Car battery hold down bolt made of quality stainless steel, with high strength, sturdy and stable structure, withstand daily scratch and vibration but not easy to break and damage, rust-resistant and durable, prolonging service life of battery and hold down parts

Product Specification: Battery hold down bolt total length 10 inch and thread part length 4 inch, length is designed to be widely compatible with standard battery tray of most vehicles, and you can also use professional tools to cut it to most suitable size for easy installation

Easy to Install: Easy installation, put the battery hold down hook through bolt holes in car battery hold down bracket and tighten nuts, make sure it is securely fastened and installation complete, package includes washers, you can install it to protect top of bolt from wear and tear

Complete Mounting Kit: You will receive 2pcs 10 inch battery hold down hook, 2pcs hex nuts, 2pcs rubber washers, 2pcs rubber protective sleeves, 2pcs spring washers, 2pcs flat washers, a full set of mounting kits to meet your needs, a nice choice for car repair and maintenance

name: Battery Hold Down Bracket, Aluminum Alloy Battery Tie Down Bracket, Battery Tray for Car Battery Mount Bracket Hold Lock Accessories, Car Battery Lock Down- with 10inches J Bolts (Black)
short_description: 【Why choose this product】When the original battery bracket of your car is aging or unstable, our high-quality battery holder can be a good replacement, keeping your battery in its original position under any driving conditions

【High-quality Aluminum】The battery hold down bracket is made of high-quality aluminum alloy, which is robust, rust-free and oxidation-free. The thickened aluminum design on the side enhances the corrosion resistance and durability of the product. The surface of the holder is anodized for a long-lasting finish. Two vibrant colors add a nice attractive and clean look to your engine compartment

【Wide Application】Hold down battery Suitable for Batteries 175mm (6.89") wide or narrower. Made of high-quality materials, this hold-down is designed to fit most batteries and prevent them from moving around while driving. It’s easy to install and remove, making it convenient for maintenance and replacement. The hold-down also prevents damage to the battery and other components in the engine compartment. With our battery hold-down, you can rest assured that your car’s battery is safe and secure.

Practical Function: Battery tie down can serve to fix and balance the battery, effectively protect your battery and ensure your safety while driving. It stabilizes the battery and also effectively protects it from battery damage caused by long hours of driving. It is suitable for most flat-top battery installations

Package Includes: 1 x black car battery holder bracket, 2 x 10 inch J-hooks, 2 sets of accessories (for different mounting methods) - 2 wing bolts, 2 hex nuts, 2 rubber protectors, 2 rubber protectors washers, 2 spring lock washers, 2 flat washers. Easy to install, simply replace the old battery holder to better secure the battery

Widely Compatible: Battery hold down kit typically fits most groups 21, 21R, 22F, 22HF, 22R, 24, 24H, 24R, 24T, 25, 26, 26/70 27, 27H, 28, 29H, 30H, 31, 31A, 31T, 33, 34, 34R, 34/78, 40R, 41, 42 43, 46, 47, H6(48), H8(49), 85, 86, 90, 91, 92, 93, 94R, 95R, 96R, 97R, 98R, 99, 124, and 140R batteries. short_description: 【Stable Structure】:This battery base is made of high-quality PP material and the bolt is made of 304 stainless steel. They are sturdy and reliable, not easily oxidized or rusted, and have excellent corrosion resistance, making them resistant to deformation or damage even after long-term use.

【Cushioning and Shockproof】:This car battery holder has excellent shock resistance, which can firmly fix the battery in the appropriate position. It not only prevents the battery from vibrating during driving, reducing friction with the vehicle body but also prevents the battery from loosening or falling off during bumpy roads or sudden braking, effectively extending the battery life.

【Easy to Install】:This car battery hold down bracket is easy to install and does not require complex steps. You only need to use a screwdriver to remove the old device, then install this device and tighten the bolts. After installation, it is very sturdy and will not easily fall off.
【Scope of Application】:This car battery hold down kit is the perfect replacement for the original battery holder. It can replace OEM number 14005061 and is compatible with most General Motors models.
